sentences.sContent: They have been at the forefront of the campaign for political change.
sentences.sCn: 他们一直处于政治变革运动的前沿。

remMethod.val: fore(前面) + front(前面) → 前面的前面 → 最前沿

trans.tranCn: 最前沿， 最前线； 中心
trans.tranOther: If you are at the forefront of a campaign or other activity, you have a leading and influential position in it
